title: Keep a Little Soul
lyrics:
I know you tried hard
Hard to get it right
There's a sadness
In your eyes
Oh little one
Who lives like a king

Don't be afraid to depend on me



Doesn't matter

Whoa oh oh

Said ya keep a little soul and nothing really matters anymore

Doesn't matter

Whoa oh oh

Honey keep a little soul and nothing gonna matter anymore



Lately I been thinkin' 'bout

Gettin' out of town

Go all the parties

Go look around

You think it over babe

You come with me

Don't be afraid to live what you believe



Nothin matters

Whoa oh oh

When ya keep a little soul and nothing really matters anymore

Doesn't matter

Whoa oh oh

Honey keep a little soul and nothing gonna matter anymore



Warm people got soul honey

Hard people got dreams

Don't be afraid to give what you believe in

Oh depend on me

Don't be afraid to live what you believe



Nothin' matters

Whoa oh oh

When ya keep a little soul and nothing really matters anymore
